https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/rd2pFAjm1J8NWX19MKqeFE0WHgP.jpg It follows Kathy, a food critic in New York City. Her parents ask her to come home for Christmas, and there she meets a handsome police officer, which now complicates her situation. Christmas at the Holly Hotel
